name: Custom Newsletter Template
author: cybernetikz

sections.description:
You can create your own custom template for newsletter using this plugins. It is so easy and simple for any user to manage. By using this, you can customize each and every content of the newsletter template from WordPress admin panel.

Paid Support ( $30 / Hour, We accept PayPal )

Email us if you need paid support, support@cybernetikz.com

Key Feature

  • Create your own newsletter template for your domain.
  • HTML is based on table tag so it will generate same output for all mail services available, like Yahoo, Gmail, AOL, MSN, Microsoft Outlook etc.
  • Ability to control / customize each and every content of newsletter template like, background color, background image, font color, selective text, favicon, page title, header image, footer content, ads image/link, social image/link, post count etc.
  • Fully inline css to support all the email services available, like Yahoo, Gmail, AOL, MSN, Microsoft Outlook etc.
  • Used direct image url for image tag, so will not be broken.

Please visit our site www.cybernetikz.com/
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugins and extract the files
  2. Upload “custom-newsletter-template” to your wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugins through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Check the “Custom Template” Tab created by this plugins
  5. Plugins will automatically create a new page named “Custom Newsletter Template”, see this page for newsletter template
  6. http://your-domain/custom-newsletter-template/ use this url for newsletter template.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download the plugins and extract the files
  2. Upload “custom-newsletter-template” to your wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugins through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Check the “Custom Template” Tab created by this plugins
  5. Plugins will automatically create a new page named “Custom Newsletter Template”, see this page for newsletter template
  6. http://your-domain/custom-newsletter-template/ use this url for newsletter template.

How to use this plugins

  • Plugins will automatically create a new page named “Custom Newsletter Template” , see this page for newsletter template
  • http://your-domain/custom-newsletter-template/ use this url for newsletter template.
